org.jemmy.fx.control.caspian

Class CaspianDriverFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jemmy.fx.control.ThemeDriverFactory
      • org.jemmy.fx.control.caspian.CaspianDriverFactory

  • public class CaspianDriverFactory
extends ThemeDriverFactory
    Defines control behaviour for Caspian theme. Ported from the project JemmyFX, original class is org.jemmy.fx.control.caspian.CaspianDriverFactory

    shura
